wikipedia_page.main: John Buchanan (1 January 1884 in Rhu – 25 November 1943 in Rhu) was a Scottish sailor who competed for the Royal Clyde Yacht Club in the 1908 Summer Olympics.He was a crew member of the Scottish boat Hera, which won the gold medal in the 12-metre class.

response: *John Buchanan, Olympic Gold medal-winning sailor
